IsaacExt:Planetarium.NAME: Planetarium
DESCRIPTIONS: You come to a room made of glass all around and on the ground. NL Through the room, you can see the #b~endless sea of stars~ NL In the middle of the room, there is a relic. NL What are you going to do?
Maybe it's just waiting for you.
You think it's better not to touch this thing for the sake of caution. After all, this room alone is weird enough.

IsaacExt:HiddenRoomEvent.NAME: Hidden Room
DESCRIPTIONS: #r~bang！~ NL  NL It's really a hidden room, worthy of being a master of Feng Shui.
#r~bang！~ NL  NL Nothing happens, the fall of Feng Shui master.
OPTIONS: [Angry shout] Drain the Larynx charge and enter the hidden room.
[Locked] Need: Larynx. And the Larynx charge number should be greater than or equal to 2.

IsaacExt:AngelRoomEvent.NAME: Angel Room
DESCRIPTIONS: "Congratulations on your winning the boss combat. Take one of these relics you like."
You think this one is good.
You don't think there's a single relic fits you.
